data.actual_result: Search feature is unusable for more than 1 user
data.expected_result: You should be able to search for as many users as you want, aslong as you haven't reached the limit of 10 users for the group
data.short_description: In the "Add friends to Group DM" screen, it's impossible to use Search again if a user has already been selected using Search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friends list - Tap on the icon with two bodies with a + (Add friends to Group DM) - Tap on the search bar, and input the first characters of a friend - When your desired friend shows up, select it - Attempt to search for a second user
